answer: Cloud computing is the delivery of computing services over the internet, including storage, processing power, and databases.
The different types of cloud services are Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS).
AWS, or Amazon Web Services, is a comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform offered by Amazon, providing over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally.
Serverless computing allows you to build and run applications and services without having to manage infrastructure. AWS Lambda is an example of serverless computing.
Benefits of cloud computing include cost savings, scalability, flexibility, disaster recovery, and security.
